title: More Javascript
description: In this project, I completed a series of exercises to practice using the JavaScript language.

title: Events and Objects
description: For this project, I practiced with basic Javascript events and components to create a simple interactive quiz.

title: Shared Libraries
description: In this project, I used the jQuery library to create a prototype quiz style game.

title: Enhanced User Interfaces
description: In this project, I explored adding draggable and droppable interactions, and various widgets from the JQuery UI library.

title: jQuery Plugin Promotional Site
description: This project showcases and promotes the jQuery plugins Typed.js and jQuery Ripples.

title: Class Map
description: This project uses the Leaflet Javascript library to create a simple interactive map.

title: Map-Based Mobile App
description: This project uses the Leaflet library with an external JSON file to create an interactive map experience, showcasing spooky places around the world.

title: Basic Data Visualization
description: In this project, I used jQuery and custom JavaScript to visualize data from an external JSON file on an HTML5 canvas.

title: Advanced Visualization
description: This project uses the D3 library to create a data visualization with SVG elements and external JSON file data.

title: Basic Game
description: This project uses Phaser 3 to create a simple platform game.

title: My Game
description: This project uses Phaser 3 to create and design a computer-based game.
